title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Adviser 
(Minister of State at the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, 
Integration and Youth) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department child equality disability integration youth) order 2023

title: them by section 11(1) of the Public Service Management Act 1997 (No. 27 of
heading: 2. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. Noel Byrne, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth, is appointed to be a Special Adviser to Anne Rabbitte, Minister of State 
at the Department of Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, 
with effect from 1 March 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 December, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 22nd December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [704] 3

ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
